SEARCH
Package com.Dao

Class DaoSession

java.lang.Object
com.Dao.DaoSession
public class DaoSession extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user sessions in the database. This singleton class provides methods to create, validate, update, and delete sessions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sahana

  • Constructor Details

    • DaoSession

      public DaoSession()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DaoSession getInstance(String session)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of DaoSession. If a session ID is provided, updates the last accessed time.
      Parameters:
      session - The session ID to update last accessed time.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of DaoSession.
      Since:
      1.0

    • createSession

      public boolean createSession(String sessionId, int userId, LocalDateTime expiryTime)
      Creates a new session in the database.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The unique ID of the session.
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the session.
      expiryTime - The expiration time of the session.
      Returns:
      true if the session was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateSession

      public static boolean updateSession(TreeSet<BeanSession> list) throws SQLException
      Updates the last accessed time and expiry time for a set of sessions.
      Parameters:
      list - A TreeSet of BeanSession objects containing session details.
      Returns:
      true if any sessions were updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • autoDeleteExpiredSessions

      public static void autoDeleteExpiredSessions() throws SQLException
      Deletes expired sessions from the database in batches.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • validateSession

      public int validateSession(String sessionId, javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cookies)
      Validates a session by checking its existence and expiry time.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The ID of the session to validate.
      cookies - An array of cookies associated with the session.
      Returns:
      The user ID if the session is valid; 0 if the session is invalid or expired.

    • invalidateSession

      public boolean invalidateSession(String sessionId)
      Invalidates a session by deleting it from the database.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The ID of the session to invalidate.
      Returns:
      true if the session was successfully invalidated, false otherwise.
